name: firefox-supernumber
description: Adds keyboard shortcut Super+1 to switch to the first tab, Super+2 to switch to the second, and so on. Super+9 switches to the last tab.

scripts.test: jsonlint --quiet *.json src/*.json && eslint . && web-ext lint --warnings-as-errors --no-input=true --source-dir src

author: Alex Zolotko
